import React from 'react' import {Button, Col, Row , ListGroup, Image, Card, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutStep from '../components/CheckoutStep' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const orderCreate = useSelector(state => state.orderCreate) const {loading, success , error} = orderCreate const {shippingAddress, cartItems} = cart //fun for decimal const addDecimal = (num) =>{ return (Math.round(num*100)/100).toFixed(2) } let i = 0; addDecimal(cartItems.map((item)=> { i += (item.price * item.qty) })) console.log(i) i = 100 cart.itemsPrice = addDecimal(i) const placeOrderHandler = () => { } return ( <>

Shipping

Address : {shippingAddress.address}, {shippingAddress.city}, {shippingAddress.postalcode}, {shippingAddress.country}.

Payment Method

{cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{/* {cartItems.length === 0 ? (Your Cart is Empty) : */} {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) =>( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = ${(item.price)*(item.qty)} ))}

Order Summary

 Items ${cart.itemsPrice} shipping ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax ${cart.taxPrice} Total ${cart.totalPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
